intro.heading: Financial Support & Grants
intro.description: Although Groupe Nolet & Andrews does not offer direct financing, we support businesses in the complete financial analysis of their projects to identify financing programs and grants available in Quebec and Canada.

point1.title: Project analysis
point1.description: We assess your company's structure, your project's viability and its alignment with existing program criteria.

point2.title: Eligibility & strategy
point2.description: We identify relevant grants, credits or programs and build a realistic strategy to maximize your chances of acceptance.

card.title: Process management
card.description: We can handle the preparation, completion and transmission of required applications and forms, saving you time and reducing the risk of errors.

section3.heading: Sustainable Impact
section3.quote: Good financial support means transforming a solid project into a concrete opportunity, while efficiently navigating available programs.
